message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $180. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to spend no more than $120. Would it be possible for us to negotiate towards that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While $180 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $160 to make this work. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget, I would like to propose a price of $140. I hope this is within your consideration.
